overview: Ass, grass or cash! No one rides for free. This parody thriller gets you high with the hottest girls in XXX! One deep inhale of Blair Williams' new hybrid strain gets you horny as hell, and everyone wants a toke, but the Russian Mafia is stealing it for themselves! Find out who gets fucked by who on every level of this wild ride by Hustler!
title: Ass, Grass & Cash
